Question.Subject: Why my status bar most of the time say " Done, but with errors on page"?
Question.Content:
the status bar that is in my internet explorer page down under thats say's " done but with errors" and there is yellow sign with it. How can I fix it because sometimes I cant for example click back botton and it responds, so what should I do?
Thank u very very much P.S I always delete my history and cookies when I see it but it doesnt work
Question.ChosenAnswer: Sometimes sites take more time to load, or internet connection bandwidth is less. So, try to reload the page.

Answer.Content: it doesnt really mean anything, theyre minor errors in the background that dont effect much, its typically minor coding errors, or a ad timed out because of lag or something
Sometimes sites take more time to load, or internet connection bandwidth is less. So, try to reload the page.
